website_summaries.verdict: This is a top seller: a classic skinny jean from Levi's and a modern staple for the wardrobe.
pros: Classic zipper fly with button at waist
cons: Buyers should note that the waist sits very high, and material may not be as thick as they are expecting

customer_reviews.title: Great, Comfy Jeans
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 27 even though I typically wear a 28. They might run a teeny bit large. My hips are 37” or 38” and my thighs are 23” around. They have a good amount of stretch and hit just below the belly button. I’m super happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: S. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: High waisted, somewhere between jeans and leggings, super comfortable, and they look great! I got size 33, normally I'm a 14 or L/XL in pants/leggings, 5'3" and about 185 and the 33 fits great
customer_reviews.author: Shayna M. Weddle

customer_reviews.title: Sizing difference between colors
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dark pair and the distressed pair in the exact same size 26 regular length 30”. The dark pair was longer and way tighter in the legs (thigh knee and calf) than the distressed pair. Will be returning the dark pair. I have pictures of both and I am 5’6” 113 lbs, 31” chest, 25” waist, 35” hip for reference. Loved how the distressed pair fit though!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Size up!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Phew! Let me catch my breath after squeezing into these. 155 and 5’2”. Usually a 30/31, 10 or large in bottoms AFTER ordering these on sale, saw to order a size up. I followed the size guide but should be researched more but rushed into the purchase due to the sale. They’re thick and have read they won’t stretch one bit. When I do get them on, everything looks high and tight!....and then you go up a bit further and see me spilling over the waistband. Goals for 2019 I suppose!
customer_reviews.author: M. Maynard

customer_reviews.title: BLOOD ON BRAND NEW PANTS?!
customer_reviews.text: I think the picture tells enough. I think this is an Amazon issue? Are these returned used pants? Why am I paying regular price and how disgusting is this?! I just took these off because who would have thought to look inside the legs... I freaked out thinking my legs were bleeding... Nope just the jeans had old blood on them!!! I love Amazon... But this is absolutely messed up!!! I added my legs just to show... NO BLOOD OF MINE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Haarer

customer_reviews.title: In less than a month these jeans started losing their ...
customer_reviews.text: In less than a month these jeans started losing their shaping and getting these weird wiggly stripes in the crotch area, Im guessing it’s from the elastic breaking down or something. They fit a little tighter than other Levi’s I have in the “same size”.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Took a risk buying jeans online and it paid off!
customer_reviews.text: I’m super happy with these! I’ve never bought jeans online before and I didn’t think they’d even fit, but it turns out they fit pretty perfectly. I got a size 28- I’m 5’6” and weigh about 127 lbs. They are tight but not suffocating and the material is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Villasenor

customer_reviews.title: Fake Levis
customer_reviews.text: Levi 721 are my favorite jeans, these were NOT that! I was sent a pair of tissue paper scratchy pants with cheap Plastic buttons and zipper and both front pocket seams sewn so that the white liner shows at all times and a crooked butt seam. Totally unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany P

customer_reviews.title: VERY nice stretch and they're SUPER comfy
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are EVERYTHING!! They fit perfectly. I'm 5'5, 198lbs and I ordered a 16. VERY nice stretch and they're SUPER comfy. They don't cut into your waist. NO F.U.P.A and they DO NOT pack you in and give you that "long booty" look. These jeans show off your curves, hides the tummy and snatches the waist!! Off to buy more...
customer_reviews.author: She_Got_Juice

customer_reviews.title: Levi Jeans
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little concerned that on the red little tag it doesn’t say Levis, it’s just a R. Is that normal? See picture.
customer_reviews.author: AyalaFam

customer_reviews.title: Steady Rock &  Blue Story
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’6”, 170 pounds and gain weight in my post menopausal belly and the size 31 fit great. I bought these because I love Levis and these don’t disappoint. The material has stretch and the Rise long, going all the way to my belly button. The rise with the stretch is so effective that it sucks my belly in and helps give me shape. The stretch is also comfortable. The leg is definitely skinny, almost like a legging. Colors in my pics are blue story- a medium dark blue and steady rock- gray with Lighter faded areas on legs Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMistress

customer_reviews.title: Love!! Ended up buying two pairs!
customer_reviews.text: If these are “fake Levi’s” like some are claiming in the comments, then they did a pretty good job of faking it. The tags, logo and sticker all seem to shape up for me. Fits well! I wish they were a thicker denim but I think the bit of stretch is good for a pair of jeans. Five stars. UPDATE: i bought a second pair because I loved the first ones so much! I got the light wash with the frayed ends. Sizing seemed consistent and the tags still looked legitimate. Love these jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Lily F.

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite jeans!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're taller or curvy (especially if your torso is a little long or your waist is markedly indented compared to hips/seat), and you're looking for high rise skinny jeans, look no further. I have these in black and grey. They fit well, they are flattering, and work well with a wide array of outfits. They're durable too – I practically live in these things and they hardly look worn out at all, (minus normal dye fading from washing) Just make sure to size up – they run slightly small.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Best jeans I have
customer_reviews.text: Was a little skeptical on ordering jeans here because I was worried about the fit. But these are great! I love them. Will def order another. I don’t spend much on jeans nor do I like them much because I’d rather wear shorts or sweats. But these are very comfortable. I got a 27x30 and they fit perfect. They also hide my muffins top lol. I’m 5’3 and 118lbs. The jeans are super stretchy but still fit perfectly. Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I'm 5'11" and 190 lbs, the 33Ls fit perfectly, look great, and haven't any visible panty lines in sight. Plus, soooo comfy. The fabric doesn't quite feel like denim, but when it looks this good, who cares?
customer_reviews.author: DTLA Lady

customer_reviews.title: Loooove these!
customer_reviews.text: So! These pants are perfect, they fit amazing and they are flattering. I am 5’4, 120 lbs, waist is 26” and hips 35”, I got a size 4 and 32” long. I am weird and like my skinny jeans long! They wrinkle a bit at the bottom, just how I like! Amazon suggested I get a size 6 but I knew a 4 would be right! These are great pants and I love them! The only thing is the pockets are small, but hey that’s women’s jeans for you lol. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn0990

customer_reviews.title: Ugh, Levi's horrible sizing strikes again..
customer_reviews.text: Quality control at Levi's is totally non existent. Shame too because i really fell in love with the bandit black ones and they were super rad when i opened them, but when i tried them on they were too tight. These are low stretch as well which isn't advertised and the large hole isn't directly over the knee, it's above it so my leg chub blobbed out of the hole making a not so attractive look...i really love 721 high rise Levi's but i go through hell trying to find good fitting ones on line and in store. I'm 5'5 140lbs. for reference and i wear a 28 in this style.
customer_reviews.author: brunettedoll5150

customer_reviews.title: Runs true to size.. depending on color and material.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5 and 159lbs 36chest 38 good thick in middle. The 32 was a tad to large... i washed them in a warm wash..and the them in dryer... and how they are almost perfect... i bought the holy pants with Smokey color.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit as usual
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty much the only jeans I wear and I usually buy these at the Levi's outlet but since they've been closed I decided to buy them here. I picked up 28x32 and they fit just like my outlet ones do and they were cheaper. Win win!
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Skinny, stretchy and keeps the muffin under control.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these in my normal size 26 but the waist was extremely tight especially when I sat down...thanks muffin. I then decided to try a 27 and again it was too small in the waist. I decided to give it one more try in a size 28 and yay they fit! Surprisingly, my butt looked great in all the sizes because of the stretch in the fabric. If you have a larger waist I would go up a size or two. I have a 28.5" waist and a 36" hips and the size 28 fit the best and I didn't even have to wear a belt.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nony

customer_reviews.title: Different material and color sent.
customer_reviews.text: First ordered the distressed in size 26, I'm 5'3 117 lbs and they were tight. Sent them back and ordered a 27 in the Blue Story. They fit but the material had absolutely no give. Not the same material as the distressed pair. Very disappointed. AND they arrived not the color 'blue story' as shown in the picture. It was a way lighter color. So I sent them back for a replacement of the actual color shown. We'll see how they arrive.... Bottom line poor quality control...
customer_reviews.author: jaymie

customer_reviews.title: my new favorite jeans
customer_reviews.text: This style is very flattering. I love the high rise, there is no gap in the lower back, they don't slide down when I bend or sit, and the fabric has plenty of stretch without becoming baggy. They are very comfortable. This style is great for tucking (or half tucking) a shirt. I tried different washes and found that they did not all fit the say but I found one I liked and ordered several pair.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fitting jeans
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’6”, 165lb, 29” waist, 40” hips, 33” inseam 29 M fit perfect Nice rigid structure really holds everything in Slimming Reminds me of 100% cotton jeans Hit above my belly button I just didn’t think the high waist was flattering on me (I bought these to try w/ Prime Wardrobe) so I returned them, but if you do like high waisted jeans you’ll love these. I recommend, if you like high waisted jeans
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Love these jeans!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of Levi’s I have owned since college (I am in my 50’s). Not because I don’t like Levi’s but because I haven’t found a pair that fits me comfortably. These jeans are amazing! They pull me in in all the right places without feeling tight of uncomfortable. I will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: KWill not review if asked P

customer_reviews.title: Decent value.  Great for curvy women!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews. These are great jeans...I think they're over priced, but what isn't? The higher waist comes to just above belly button. The smoothing/ slimming effect is decent and tops most middle of the road brands. The fabric seems to have enough elasticity that the tighter legs are also smoothing. They won't bring you from fat to skinny like some ingenious brands at $200 but these are a good value. I ordered these in a second color and I have yet to wash them. I'm 5'7" and the regular length is just slightly long. I greatly appreciate the wide variety of precision sizing. All clothing should be sold this way!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Stack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love these jeans, I was so scared to order jeans online but they fit me better than anything I’ve ever purchased in store. I’m 5’4”, 132lbs and ordered a 6. Absolutely perfect fit, I’ll definitely be ordering another pair! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Jacoby

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I got a size 34, which I have in the 311s, and these were beyond tight, I was able to button them but they were tight throughout, not even in specific areas. It’s a shame because they are so cute but they didn’t fit. I returned them and got my refund but I just wanted to let everyone know that if you can, please size up one or more sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Tao

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Jean!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these jeans! I usually have to get a “curvy” fit in jeans-I am 5’7 and 150 lbs and I LOVE they way they fit. They feel amazing when you put them in and and they don’t get stretched out when you wear them. I love the higher waist which is very sliming and does not give you the muffin top effect. I have them in whit and black!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great Jeans
customer_reviews.text: This high rise skinny jean is everything you need in a pair of high rise, it is comfortable, but also fits your figure, it also has enough room to stretch so youre able to fit a pair of thermals for winter or shapeware. The jean does loosen with wear, as all jeans do, but a cycle in the washer and dryer fixes that problem. This is a bit long for me, I'm 5ft4, and pretty normally proportioned, but the pants length passes my feet and goes onto the floor, I have to roll it up two folds to have it just right above my ankle. Otherwise, it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Peach

customer_reviews.title: The calves and ankles feel more like tights...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7" about 160 pounds. Problem area is my tummy. The waist was perfect! Felt really comfortable, especially with the higher rise. I just wasn't crazy for the super snug fit in the calves. I don't have big calves. (I don't have to wear larger calves boots), but these are too tight for my taste. I feel they would be uncomfortable by mid day. Of course the Levi's quality is there, and the color was great... if you like tight calves and ankles...here ya go!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: We have a winner!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these jeans! The rise is perfect, no gap, no muffin top. The pockets are well placed. The legs are just the right amount of skinny without looking too tight, and a bunch of stretch lines. The length is great (I'm 5'5") and TGIF is a great medium blue color. I recently bought the wedgie fit jeans with high hopes because I love the wedgie shorts. I have a pear shaped body so I figured the jeans would be perfect. They're just ok though, a little too much of a mom jean. The 721s are completely flattering and fit in all the right places. I'm going to get a couple more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Up the Game is sparkly and not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I should have zoomed in on the picture. Color Up the Game is sparkly all over - definitely not what I was looking for. The fabric was less jean and more of a strong, thick, stretchy material. I am 5’4” 127 lbs and I ordered a 28 R. They were a bit tight creating a minor muffin top but fit great every where else. I am returning due to the sparkle factor.
customer_reviews.author: ABianchi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jeans
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely am in love with these jeans! They are seriously so cute! Good quality and perfect fit as described on product page. I'm really happy with these and am most definitely considering buying the same jeans in a different wash. I only wish they had more washes available and they had more in stock for the short sizes! These high rise jeans are fabulous and I recommend trying them, truly these 721's have converted me to Levi's <3
customer_reviews.author: Tes

customer_reviews.title: When I chose "Long" I expect L34, not 32.
customer_reviews.text: For all tall women out there, I think you'd like to know that if you order "long" you'll receive L32 and not 34 as should be expected.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured, Love!!
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly comfortable and fit just as expected. Going to be wearing them a lot this spring!! I'm 5'9" 138lbs for reference size 29(8) were pretty close to perfect, just a little gapping in the waist but that is typical for my body shape.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McMullen

customer_reviews.title: Great fit - LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best jeans ever. I want to get rid of all my other jeans and just buy more of these jeans. The fit is perfect. The legs are very skinny but the waist is never too tight. I have no shape - thick waist, no butt, fat tummy - but I’m rocking these jeans. I feel great about me when I wear them. But the pockets aren’t deep enough to put my iPhone in. I had a seamstress do a pocket transplant from an old pair of jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: A MIRACLE - they FIT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have an hourglass/pear shape figure & I’m kind of long waisted, so jeans are almost impossible! I saw a video that suggested these Levi’s as the solution to my eternal problem of the too big waist, “bucket back”, & lower back/underwear exposure when I sit.....oh my gosh - it’s true! These are fabulous! I never thought ANY Levi’s would fit Me, but these are great! Nice pocket placement, too. (5-5, 145, size 10 short)
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and flattering!!
customer_reviews.text: These skinny jeans are nearly perfect for me! I have slim hips and thighs, ordered size 8. I'm 5'6", 146 lbs. They have just the right amount of stretch, are the perfect length (no ankle showing), and the waist is high enough that there's no muffin top problem. The rear is very flattering, since I'm pretty straight - no boots at all. These probably wouldn't be good for curvy girls. The only thing I would change would be the back pocket placement... make them a bit smaller and higher, but that's pretty standard for Levis. Highly recommend for those who want a slim fit through the rear, hips and thighs!
customer_reviews.author: lauri keane

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’3” 200lbs, normally wear a size 14. I ordered these in 33 short and they're still a little snug, I probably could've gone up one more size even. But I like them other than that: not too long, no gap in the back, and best of all no camel toe! The fabric is really soft and comfy, and the high rise sits right at my natural waist. The only thing yet to be seen is how long the inner thighs hold up to chub rub, but so far I’m loving these jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: My new go-to jeans. Hoorah!
customer_reviews.text: I hate buying jeans and couldn't find any that I liked in stores so I decided to take a chance on these. I'm really glad I did! I'm about 5' 10'' with an athletic build and a bigger booty. The high rise fits me perfectly without strangling my waist. They're a little roomy in the knee area but I've grown to really prefer the slight roominess of these pants over my other high waisted skinny jeans that feel like leg prisons. For the price they are way more quality than I was expecting them to be. Never had such luck buying jeans online. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SMH

customer_reviews.title: Reeks of chemicals
customer_reviews.text: The jeans fit great, however the smell of what is likely formaldehyde is so strong that they're basically unwearable. I've already washed them 4 times using different methods (detergent, baking soda, vinegar, etc.). I've even soaked them for days at a time. It's ridiculous -- as someone with health issues and chemical sensitivities my body really can't be around this toxic garbage. These companies should seriously rethink their methods and the damage they're inflicting on people and the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: New favorite pair
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with these! They fit me perfectly in every aspect. I'm 5ft3in and 116 lbs. I ordered a 25S. They are a great length and are tight around the waist with no space. Will serouisly consider buying another pair in this style
customer_reviews.author: Justin David

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I actually love the substantial weight of these... they aren’t leggings, but they do stretch. They keep their shape all day. The color is great. I’ve has 4 kids and so I guess high rise jeans- mom jeans - have a place in my wardrobe now!!
customer_reviews.author: bld424

customer_reviews.title: Buy them, like, right now.
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are perfect. They fit like a glove and aren’t overly stretchy. I am shocked at how well the fit for the price. I’m a 10 and the 30s fit perfectly and were long enough to actually hit right at my ankle as opposed to just above like other jeans. I love them. I’m buying another pair right now. Obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time buyer of Levi’s.... I’m IMPRESSED!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing Levi’s jeans and I am so impressed at how well they fit me and how comfy & stretchy they are. I am petite I’m 5’1 121lbs with an inseam of 28 so I was expecting these to be longer on me but they’re actually a perfect fit! & not mention they make my butt look GREAT... lol. I will be buying more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah John

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: I like these better than I expected. Are they mom jeans? I don't know, maybe. I haven't worn pants that went over my bellybutton in 20 years. Maybe on this 39 year old they don't look as cool as they would on a 20 year old, but they are comfy. They are a tad long (I'm 5'5"), but I should have ordered the petite to be fair. They just bunch a bit at my ankles which I think looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Tearing at the seams when brand new
customer_reviews.text: They are pulling at the seams and have unattractive white because of how cheap they are. I expected so much more from Levi. Exact same as what we bought in a store and lasted six months. Got them replaced by Amazon, other pair has the exact same problem.
customer_reviews.author: hannibal

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are far more comfortable than I expected. Not stiff at all, and not too baggy either. I seldomly find a high-rise jean that isn’t too stiff around the waist, but these are great. I’ve washed and worn them several times, and they don’t get loose throughout the day
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hillis

customer_reviews.title: Great jeans, but “Take me out” - HOLY THIGH!! 👖
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE almost everything about these jeans - the fit, the waist, the color, the length - except the thigh hole is much larger than pictured. The reason I love the Levi 721s is because they hide my “problem areas” aka hips and thighs and this particular shade does not hide the thigh busting out like a pillsbury can. 😳 For reference I am a size 26, 125 lbs, 5’5. Idk if I will keep but I do generally love the Levi 721 line!!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: i LOVE this high rise option
customer_reviews.text: it's about time i tried on some levi's jeans... these are the most flattering pair of jeans i've ever tried. i have kind of a square ass, so it's hard for me to find jeans that are flattering. i LOVE this high rise option, because it's not disturbingly, jessica simpson-ish high. i wish they had my size in all the colors, but black is the only one they had :(
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for Curvy Girls
customer_reviews.text: 5'5" 170lbs, but I look like I'm 150lbs because of my well proportioned curves. These jeans are slimming but they're not cutting off your circulation. Classic fit, nice wash denim. They look expensive for a great price. I'm wearing them now and will be getting a 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Aha Moment

customer_reviews.title: Love these jeans!
customer_reviews.text: They are so flattering and comfortable! ZERO muffin top! And they are so stretchy, I no longer feel like I need to wear activewear to feel good all day. I'm 5'7 and weight about 147 lbs. Ordered it in size 29. Fits like a glove and looks like a million bucks. If you do get them, though, notice the materials. I have these in black, Blue Story, and ordered them in lilac. Black and Blue Story fit perfectly well. The lilac ones weren't as stretchy. They fit well, but aren't as stretchy, which takes away from the comfort factor.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi 5000

customer_reviews.title: Jeans manufacturers forget that women have butts
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on your legs, but like all denim jeans manufacturers, they forget that women have curves. Which makes it uncomfortable to wear. Considering that I have a small butt, I can only imagine how uncomfortable it would be for curvy ladies. I also don't like how it gets stretchy and wrinkly on the knees within minutes of wearing it. These jeans need to be more elastic and retain their shape better around the knees. It makes it look like you've been wearing them for weeks without washing them.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine

customer_reviews.title: horrorsss
customer_reviews.text: I'm just shocked !!!! The jeans came, not only without tags, not in the branded package, but also worn, with stains on the pants and inside after menstruation. it's just awful!!! Do you even see what you are sending there ???? I even hated to take them in my hands! I was waiting for them so much, but when I received them I was insanely upset and disappointed, definitely a return.
customer_reviews.author: Alesiya

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, poor material
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pair of black levis of this style after ordering a pair of standard, dark wash color. The fit is AMAZING through thighs, butt and no gaping at the waste. Why the 3-star review? The quality of the cotton in the black jeans is terrible. Every little tiny particle of dirt gets sucked onto it. You can NOT wear cashmere in any color other than black with these, never mind any wool or anything that could potentially deposit any tiny particles onto the jeans. I don't have any of these issues with my DSTLD, Sevens, Hudsons or AG jeans. I'm stuck wearing dark colors and cotton fabrics with these jeans and lint rolling them alllllll day long.
customer_reviews.author: MashaBee

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for years for a pair of jeans that fits my waist and my thunder thighs that aren't super thin jeggings material, these are it. Thick denim material with some stretch, runs true to size, and comes right up to my bellybutton. I'm 5'8" with a 28ish inch waist and 38 inch hips, i order a 28 regular length and everything fits perfectly! I did a happy dance
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Sizing way off
customer_reviews.text: These were awful. I am 5’5, 115 pounds and almost always wear a 2. I bought a size 2 and they are wayyy tight. I’m not sure a 4 would’ve even sufficed. They’re more like legging material, very stretchy which some may like. I personally prefer my jeans to fit more like jeans rather than leggings. I got them on sale for $12 so I would’ve probably still kept them if they would’ve fit but they aren’t true to size at all. They’re going back.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like it very much
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive pant and looks very cheap when you wear it. It actually looks trashy. I’m not sure I like it but I used it once and couldn’t return it because I tore off all the tags. Wish I tried it on before ripping off the tags. I feel this will look good on white petite people only. I’m brown and a bit chubby and this is not a very good pant for me. But design and quality wise it’s good and I think we paying the $50 for the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Harshitha

customer_reviews.title: New favorite pair of jeans
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a size 2 in jeans, so that's the size I purchased here. Amazon recommends a size 6 for me and that would have been way too big! These are my new favorite pair of jeans! They fit a bit snug when you first try them on but give them a wash and wear them for a short while and they basically mold to your body. They feel like they are good quality and seem to be legitimate levi's. I purchased mine for about $23!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Basically leggings, useless front pockets and very thin
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful and the length is good. The high waist means no plumber crack, always a plus. However, two gripes: these are basically leggings. 1. They're very thin, and close-fitting to the skin. 2. The back pockets might function as pockets, but the front are an example of the annoying ongoing trend of making women's clothing impractical for the sake of...maybe cheapness? Not sure. You could fit a loose cigarette or something of that size in the front pockets, they're so shallow and weird as to be pointless. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: These have been my favorite jeans for a couple years
customer_reviews.text: These have been my favorite jeans for a couple years. I have two pair already and after not finding any others that fit as I like, I got online and found this pair. I will continue to order them! I am 5'8", 165 lbs., 32 waist, 42 hips and I order a size 30. They fit my curves in all the right ways and taper in a flattering way down to the ankle. I prefer high rise - it comes right to my belly button and sits right where the small of my waist begins. The fabric feels sturdy yet flexible. I don't like when jeans feel like leggings and these don't. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Perfect Fit For A Curvy Girl
customer_reviews.text: I am a curvy 5'7" tall 205 pounds with a size 42" hip and 32 waist. I ordered the size 33. It fits perfectly with extra room to not be skin tight. It comes way above my belly button and the leg falls below my ankle with extra room for the pant to gather at the bottom. The material is great (not too thick and not too thin jean material) and it stretches a bit. The black is very black and goes great with everything. The blue is a great jean color too. I have 3 in the black and it fades a little once washed but not too much.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fit
customer_reviews.text: I recently lost a lot of weight over 100lbs and these were the first jeans I’ve bought since I’ve lost my last 40lbs. These jeans fit like a glove! They are especially for women with curvier body types like myself and those who might usually have a gap in the back of their jeans. These jeans pretty much mold the shape of your body from ankle up to the waist. Best fitting jeans I own. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Oshodi

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: 5" & 200lbs. Up until last year, my adult weight has fluctuated between 105 & 120lbs. Due to heart medications & restrictions, I've gained a large amount of weight & retaining water. So... I'm in uncharted waters with buying clothes that fit this new body & have failed miserably, but these jeans fit! They're super cute & comfortable! I ordered size 16. Did I say how cute they make my big butt look? Well they do! However, it's a must that I roll the bottoms up (thin folds). That is nothing new. I'm short & it was difficult to find jeans that were made for my heigth when I was skinny & now. Best Wishes!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!!! If you're 5 ft tall with thick thighs, get a 29 or 30 inch rise. I'm usually a 14 in American Eagle but got these in a 16 in Levi's and they're perfect...no camel toe, they have a real fly and real pockets in front and back, they're a bit long on me (like 2 inches) but I cuffed the bottoms. They feel like a straight leg more than a skinny. The fabric is opaque and slightly stretchy. No lumps or bumps showing. These feel great, very soft. The waist hits right at my belly button. No bulges or gaps. Very pleased! Will buy more in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Justthe2ofus

customer_reviews.title: Nice jeans
customer_reviews.text: Feels like jeans, not cheap jeggings, makes my butt look pretty nice and I won’t need a belt. This is a little tight in the waist but I think I really notice it as a gastro / stomach chronic illness. I had to order the medium length as that was all was left but I don’t mind cuffing my jeans. When not cuffed they come right to my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E. Schmucker

customer_reviews.title: These run a bit small
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are definitely high waist, which is what I wanted. I ordered a size 30 and a size 31 and, while I usually wear a size 10 in denim jeans, I found the 30 (10) was too tight. The 31 fit me better. These jeans are very stretchy--almost too stretchy for me (too much stretch doesn't hold me in as much as I'd like!). I prefer a little less stretch and a more substantial denim. Mine were made in Columbia. Label recommends "water-less" washing, saying to wash less, in cold water and to line dry. The idea is to spare the earth, but I suspect they might shrink up if tumble dried--even on low heat.
customer_reviews.author: CassieOleary

customer_reviews.title: Levi’s a curvy girl’s best friend
customer_reviews.text: Levi’s. These jeans were made for hippy girls. Only jeans I wear & I love them. These are high waist & perfect if you have a “Fupa” like I do, tucks everything in. My Levi’s always make me feel sexy. I wore these with a black body suit and I looked “snatched” 😊😊. Made legs look longer. 35/36 waist, 47/48 hips.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size and colour
customer_reviews.text: 5/5 Colour was blue story. Exactly how pictured and how it is pictured on the Levi website. I am a 26 and have been for over a decade. As usual Levi’s fit true to size. I ordered the 26 worries after ready others comments about how these jeans are not true to sizes. I did not experience this and found these jeans to be exactly what I had hoped them to be! The only thing people may struggle with is the high rise. I have a very smal waist and struggle with fitting low rise jeans to my waist. I usually wear mid to a high rise so these fit me perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and sooooooo comfy
customer_reviews.text: It's seriously like wearing sweats they are so comfortable. But they still look and feel like jeans, it's an awesome material. They are very high waisted more high waisted than my other pair of 721 jeans, but I still like the way they fit and stretch. Levis last me forever and are the only brand of jeans I'll wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Are you kidding with the size??
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pair of 30's for the holidays because I knew I wouldn't fit into my 29's and they're even smaller! You've got to be kidding with these sizes. I know what fits me and this is just skimping.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie E

customer_reviews.title: Jeans are an investment
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase Levi's at first just because I always thought they were going to be too thick and restrictive and expensive. After sooo long buying discount and cheaper skinny jeans I may never go back from these Levis. They fit perfectly, aren't too thick or restrictive, have a little bit of stretch while still feeling like durable denim. They're holding up great so far and I wear my jeans to death. If you're on the fence like me consider spending the couple extra bucks for pants that are worth it and will last much longer than Old Navy.
customer_reviews.author: Butterstuff

customer_reviews.title: Tight waisted
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair for Levi’s and I really like them. I tend to like high waisted jeans more and decided to purchase these. The legs and butt fit great, the waist is a little tight. Kind gives me a muffin top and I’m 5’7 and 135lbs. I ordered a size 27. If I went up a size the fit would be too lose. Still love the jeans though, but definitely not putting them in the dryer after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost love...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give these jeans 2.5 stars. I love the color, style etc but the fit was not perfect. The jeans fit perfectly in the waist and rear area however they were just too long and loose in the legs:(. I wish they were about two inches shorter and more slim fitting throughout the leg. I am 5'1 and weigh about 150lbs. I purchased a size 10 short.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jeans and a little too long
customer_reviews.text: This pair of jeans has high waist which I really like and they are soft and very comfortable. The only problem it’s a bit too long to me. I’m in 5”5 and 125lbs, the waist fits great (actually a bit loose but it should be fine especially after you have a big meal) but I have to roll up about 2 inches twice to fit my legs. I ordered 30 regular size and I think it would be better to go one or two size down to fit the length. The jeans are not very thick as well. Considering to get another pair of super skinny which may fit better
customer_reviews.author: my36

customer_reviews.title: Best High Rise Jean for Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of an add on my facebook. It said best high rise jean on amazon or something like that. The jean has the perfect fit. For the price point it's a great buy. This jean is not the thick jean material levi normally has. It's more stretchy. Which is fine considering the price. I love the way these fit. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kiristen biggerstaff

customer_reviews.title: and I really like them. They aren't super high rise
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up after reading the reviews, and I really like them. They aren't super high rise, but instead, hit right under my belly button. The fabric is soft. I would recommend these, but definitely order 1 or 2 sizes up!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting jeans I own
customer_reviews.text: Its always hit or miss buying jeans online but these did not disappoint. They fit perfectly and the material is not ultra stretchy like most jeans on the market so these keep you held together. I'm 5'8", 140 lbs and got them in size 27. Length is perfect and they aren't so skinny that you have to struggle to get your foot through the hole. Waist is snug but there's still room in hip and thigh for some bedonkadonk. They also didn't come with that horrible chemical smell that so many dark wash/black jeans come with and takes for ever to get rid of.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fit just right!
customer_reviews.text: I was scared of buying jeans online just because they never fit right, but I finally convinced myself to get these and I LOVE THEM. They really do fit perfect so i urge you to give them a try because you will definitely love them (for reference I’m 120lbs and 5’ 6” and ordered a 25) Also the price is amazing since Levi’s are usually pretty expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Ripped at the seams and on the leg after six months of wear.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had these jeans for six months I probably worn them 10 times and they already have ripped at the seam and in the leg. They are not too tight so I have another pair that are exactly the same that I’ve lasted well over six months. I’m wondering if these are even real Levi’s as I expect higher quality from that company. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shanyn Larson

customer_reviews.title: 5’6 143lbs waist 32in Hips 38in i got a size 10
customer_reviews.text: I just got my levis jeans today and im so inlove wd it. At first i ordered size 14 since base on their chart its my waist size so i ordered that and its too big for me so i returned it and ordered size 10 and it fits its still a little tiny bigger like an inch or two bigger than what i would want it hope this wont expand in time and it washes but i dont wanna return it again il just keep this and i will just order another one next time in 8 and well see how it goes. But its great jeans i love levis!
customer_reviews.author: Tin

customer_reviews.title: True to Size not Stretchy
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews about being way too small, but decided to ignore and ordered my actual size. I’m 5’3.5” and 125 pounds (probably 130 post holidays). I ordered a size 26 and they fit perfectly! Since I am short sometimes I have to worry about length, I didn’t buy the 26s, just 26r and they’re totally fine. Love these jeans! They’re not that stretchy which most of my jeans are, but given the high rise factor, I feel like they pull everything in. If you are between sizes I’d say size up if you’re worried about comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Shanks

customer_reviews.title: Material is too stiff
customer_reviews.text: My measurements are 28in waist and 36in hips, and I got a size 6. Felt tight, and I should’ve gotten a size 8. However, I didn’t like the feel of the fabric. Too stiff and not stretchy enough. Also, I’m 5’7 and the 32 length was a bit too long on me. I would not recommend if you prefer softer and stretchier jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Ggamazon123

customer_reviews.title: Bought Two Pairs, One before Eating, and One for After eating
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Levis jeans. It is well made and complements the body. I accidentally purchased a 12, and they felt too tight, I could wear them just fine, but there would be no eating while wearing them. I ordered size 14 and they were comfy and very complimentary for roles handles.Just before returning the tight #12, I've decided to keep it for before eating and the #14 for after eating. Really great jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Wilde

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Jeans
customer_reviews.text: I loove these jeans!! I thought they were going to be made out of that cheap fake jeans material, but they're not. They're super soft, yet tough and the rise is perfect. I'm only 5'3 so they come to a bit above my belly button. The fabric is thick enough to smooth out any bumps but stretchy enough to fit comfortably. I am hoping in ordering more in different variations and i hope the other ones are just as good as these.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Lookin' Good with Humility Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, but buy a size up. I knew this about Levis, so I did just that & they fit perfectly (if you wear a 12, get a 14, if you wear a 14, get a 16, etc.). Is there an opposite for vanity sizing? Humility sizing? These are skinny jeans so they are tight in the legs. If you have thicker legs or like a looser fit, you may not like these. I wish the back pockets were higher up but that's my only complaint, my blouse usually covers my bootie anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Busy RN

customer_reviews.title: Different material than 1st pair bought
customer_reviews.text: Update: bought these same jeans in black and they were not the same. They were all bunched up in the back leg area (see pic) and the material didn’t feel the same as the first gray pair I bought. Had to return. These jeans are great, I wear them so much I might have to get another pair ASAP. They fit well around my hips and waist and are made of semi-stretchy material but not too thin. I’m 5’7” 140lbs athletic build and the W29 L30 fit great! Highly recommend if you’re into high waisted jeans.
customer_reviews.author: lg

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a recommend purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Saw a lot of mixed reviews, but decided to take the plunge and am glad I did! Snug the way they should be, where they should be, for a curvier frame, stretchy but durable enough for work (I manage a gym, lots of moving around, lifting, etc. So you know I'm rough on jeans), but still comfortable enough to wear for 10+ hour shifts. I love high waisted products, flattering without falling down, and this is truly high-waisted. I'm very short and got the 28 seam and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Savage_TheQueen

customer_reviews.title: These Levi's 721 High Waisted Jeans Fit Really Well According To Size!
customer_reviews.text: These are the Levi's 721 and they fit true to size in the 00 Medium Length which is 24 waist x 30 inseam. She is 5'5 and 105 pounds and these are perfect. I would like them a little longer but she usually only wears sneakers and likes them better like this, since the bect inseam is 2" longer. My daughter decided she had to have a pair of high rise Jean's, so after doing some research we ended up picking these due to the Reviews and tons of choices. She's wearing the distressed denim which are super cute and I'm thinking of ordering a pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sheepdogs&Poodles=SheepaDoodles

customer_reviews.title: Great jeans! Fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo.... just received the pair i ordered and i really love them! I followed a lot of the reviews and ordered one side up. They definitely fit great, seem like they will be durable, just the smallest gap at my waist. I feel like if i ordered my normal size they would have fit perfectly. For anyone else considering these... go a head and click buy! I'm 5'2 185lbs 32 inch waist 44 inch hips and i bought 33x28. I returned them and bought the 32 regular and I also bought another wash. These are the best jeans ever! They fit like they were made for me.
customer_reviews.author: adrienne pierre-butler

customer_reviews.title: Love. Will be getting more Levi's!
customer_reviews.text: These fit fabulously! The fabric is great quality- thick while still being able to stretch and move. I'm five foot one, and the 28" (s- short) inseam was perfect for me. There was a small gap at the small of my back, but nothing like I normally have. I've been hunting for jeans for a while now- I think I just found a new favorite brand. They fit so wonderfully, I can't stop raving about it! So happy to find things that fit and are made well. Even the details are thoughtfully done. I'll definitely get more.
customer_reviews.author: Carman (ContinuousDelights)

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful! Fit is absolutely gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! I ordered two with waist sizes 27 and 25 — you know for days when you feel like dressing up/down, or when you feel like forgiving yourself when you’ve eaten more the day prior ;-) I love the fit! I am petite so I would fold the jeans about an inch at the hem and its not obvious! I rarely order jeans online as I have tiny waist and voluptuous bottom — fitting has always been a challenge! However, these did not disappoint, even the smaller one! Perfect wear all year long! Go for it, its a great buy :-)
customer_reviews.author: Y L

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a size 6 but these were way too tight around the waist and even in the legs for me. That said, I do have pretty big calves. The material has a scratchy texture to them on the inside too though so I'm kinda glad they don't fit me. I will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Good but not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my typical Levis size and while I don't think these are as high-waisted as the Wedgie jean, they are high enough that I feel good in them. I purchased the color Blue Story and I would say the online photo is pretty accurate. They are quite stretchy but haven't lost their shape throughout the day. The denim is definitely thinner than the Wedgie or 501 jean in my opinion. Overall a good skinny jean to tuck into boots. My favorite cut in Levis continues to be the Wedgie.
customer_reviews.author: Laura32412

customer_reviews.title: Shapely stretch - but rugged enough to last
customer_reviews.text: I repeat buy these jeans in this high rise skinny and the midrise 711 skinny. They hold me in like Spanx, but they are still very much jean. The black Levis fade pretty quickly but washing in cool water inside-out helps the color last longer. I love all the jeans I've purchased and don't waste my time trying them on in store now that I've found my perfect fit. There are enough colors and washes of these to suit any occasion. Buy these jeans!
customer_reviews.author: Alice McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for curves!
customer_reviews.text: Love the high waste! Fabric is soft and won’t set you back hundreds of dollars. Also love having the LONG option (short torso/long legs). For curvy (bubble butt) women, these are the perfect fit! Caution: the darker colors bleed A LOT the first few washes. Turn them inside out not just the first wash, but maybe the first half dozen.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Everyone was complaining about the fake or real Levi’s. Mine looked real. Tags all looked real and it fit great. If it’s fake i don’t care. It fit perfect and very comfortable. I ordered a 27 and they felt pretty tight around my stomach. I got the 28 and ordered in 2 colors cause i loved them that much. My measurements 36B / 28W / 38H
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Loved it ... but ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm petite (5'2") and the regular length was about 4 inches too long. If I had kept these I would've had to roll them up a lot or get the bottom hemmed. I loved the way it looked -- front and back -- but the distressing was just too much for me. The waist was tighter than other sz 25 jeans I've tried, but I was still able to button up. Overall, loved the 721 but didn't like this particular style.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: I’m assssuming they’re fake because the red tag on the butt pocket doesn’t say Levi’s like the originals. But the inside also says Levi’s Mexico soooo idk what that means like are they original but from Mexico or are they making fakes in Mexico lol either way I still like them. They still look as good as Levi’s so I’ll be keeping them
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Patino

customer_reviews.title: Hotter than a 2 dollar pistol!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6" and 150 lbs. I have a short torso and long legs. I bought the 32" long inseam and size 30 (10 US), These are my first pair of high waist jeans, which aren't the best for my short waistedness, but finally the length fits! And these jeans fit snug and make my ass look hotter than a 2 dollar pistol! Ha ha! I bought these jeans on the recommendation Angie from Hot and Flashy, so thank you Angie!!
customer_reviews.author: graftonqueen

product_meta.title: Levi's Women's 721 High Rise Skinny Jeans
product_meta.description: Our 721 High Rise Skinny is a modern pin-up style with a high waist jean fit. This is a staple in your skinny jean collection, the one you’ll wear over and over. These women's high rise skinny jeans hugs your waist and the skinny leg elongates your silhouette, showing you off in all the right ways. Get yourself a pair of women's skinny jeans today.
feature_bullets: Wash And Dry Inside Out With Like Colors; Liquid Detergent Is Recommended
Jeans High Rise: Sits above waist
Inseam for Women's High Rise Skinny Jeans: 28" (Short); 30" (Medium); 32" (Long)
